keypair.create_warning: Key Pairs are how you login to your instance after it is launched. Choose a key pair name you will recognize. Names may only include alphanumeric characters, spaces, or dashes.
keypair.import_info_1: Key Pairs are how you login to your instance after it is launched.
keypair.import_info_2: Choose a key pair name you will recognise and paste your SSH public key into the space provided.
keypair.import_info_3: SSH key pairs can be generated with the ssh-keygen command
keypair.import_info_4: This generates a pair of keys: a key you keep private (cloud.key) and a public key (cloud.key.pub). Paste the contents of the public key file here.
keypair.import_info_5: After launching an instance, you login using the private key (the username might be different depending on the image you launched)
